column3: So today, we're going to play a super fun matching game.
Let us show you how it works.
Okay, so this, my friends, is Smurfy.
Now, Smurfy really wants to play this game today, okay?
So in front of your screens, you will see two pictures.
Only one of you guys will have a picture in a black box.
And Smurfy wants to guess just that picture, okay?
So if you have Smurfy, you will be guessing, okay?
You will guess the picture that is in the black box.
But [id43], if you don't have Smurfy, you will be telling, okay?
You will tell my friends what you see in the black box.
So when you're ready to make your guess, you and Smurfy
are just going to touch the picture that you think it is.
After you make your guess, you're going to see a picture.
If it's a smiley face, you helped Smurfy gets the right picture.
If it's a sad face, it wasn't a match.
But you can help Smurfy later.
Yeah, so a happy face is going to be a good match.
Alright, friends, are you ready to get started?
We'll just press our blue button.
Looks like you will be guessing today.
Alright, my friend, how are you going to tell our friend what's in the black box?
There you go, now you're going to be guessing.
Now what do we see in the black box?
Yeah, go ahead and touch it.
Now we're going to pass Smurfy.
Now what do we see in the black box?
[id43] says that he sees a human.
Which one looks like a human to you?
Now what do we see in the black box?
You have Smurfy, so you're going to guess.
So she says she sees a person, so now you're going to touch what you think is a person.
Do you see a flying human?
Now what does that look like to you?
So we're going to use our listening ears right now, and she's going to tell us which one is in the black box.
Is this one for this one?
So let's see what she says.
Go ahead and touch it one more time.
Now what does that look like?
Which one looks like a human to you?
So you don't cross Smurfy right now, so she's going to guess which one looks like a human.
Now what does this look like to you?
What does it look like to you?
She's going to press on it.
Now what does this look like to you?
Now what do you see in the black box?
Now we're going to wait for her to tell us what she sees.
Now what do you see in the black box?
What does that look like to you?
That means we're all done and thank you for playing our game.
I will now turn the camera off.
